reply_to.body: Yesterday my friend danyman2202 got banned for "hacks" even though he is just good. We were in a Skype call when all of a sudden it says he got banned. replies.body:
If you think that's a lot, you should see mine... how long ago did I pass two hundred? I've only been keeping track since late July.

Seriously, at least one person accuses me of hacking — never really sure which hack — almost every play session. They usually do so when I wipe out multiple packs of enemies at once or force my way through a well-fortified defense and kill all the armored defenders (both of which happen so often it's difficult to pick out one most memorable recollection).

Noobs will be noobs, I suppose.
replies.body_tagged:

Noobs will be noobs, I suppose.

replies.body:
I was playing a match of Op skywars on an unnamed server (I don't advertise).

So I pick the kit with full dia prot 3,speed pot,health pot,and sharp 2 dia sword.

So I browse through my chests,get regen 2 pots and gapps and all that stuff.

So I went to spawn to get some loot,and I started getting gang banged on by a team of two (they both had the same stuff as me,if not, better)

So I started fighting,almost died,and escaped to another island.They followed me there.Long story short,I rekt em' cuz I got lucky and hit 1 guy off the world,the other was just really bad (or I was just try hard mode :P).At around the end of the fight, he stopped to type,and I quote,the words " eZ ban".

PS:I never got banned :P
replies.body_tagged:
I was playing a match of Op skywars on an unnamed server (I don't advertise).

So I pick the kit with full dia prot 3,speed pot,health pot,and sharp 2 dia sword.

So I browse through my chests,get regen 2 pots and gapps and all that stuff.

So I went to spawn to get some loot,and I started getting gang banged on by a team of two (they both had the same stuff as me,if not, better)

So I started fighting,almost died,and escaped to another island.They followed me there.Long story short,I rekt em' cuz I got lucky and hit 1 guy off the world,the other was just really bad (or I was just try hard mode :P).At around the end of the fight, he stopped to type,and I quote,the words " eZ ban".

PS:I never got banned :P
